<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_page">
    <sp_page action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <category>sp_platform</category>
        <css>// each column has a flex-item classs
.flex-item {
  width: 50%;
  position: relative;
}

.v5001b062d7101200b0b044580e6103eb > .panel , .flex-item .vfd1f4ec347730200ba13a5554ee490c0 > .panel-shift > .panel {
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  right: 0;
  left: 0;
  margin: 0;
  overflow: hidden;
  border-radius: 0;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  height: 100%;

  > .panel-body {
    overflow: scroll;
    -webkit-overflow-scrolling: touch;
    flex-grow: 1;
  }

  > .panel-heading, .panel-footer {
    flex-shrink: 0;
  }

  > .panel-heading {
    height: 52px;
  }
}

footer {
	position: static;
}</css>
